Uses of Class
se.softhouse.jargo.CommandLineParser

  • Packages that use CommandLineParser 
    Package Description
    se.softhouse.jargo
    An argument and options parser for java

    • Uses of CommandLineParser in se.softhouse.jargo

      Methods in se.softhouse.jargo that return CommandLineParser 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommandLineParser CommandLineParser.andArguments(Argument<?>... argumentsToAlsoSupport)
      Adds support for argumentsToAlsoSupport in this CommandLineParser.
      CommandLineParser CommandLineParser.andCommands(Command... commandsToAlsoSupport)
      Adds support for commandsToAlsoSupport in this CommandLineParser.
      CommandLineParser CommandLineParser.locale(Locale localeToUse)
      Locale.getDefault() is dangerous to use.
      CommandLineParser CommandLineParser.programDescription(String programDescription)
      Sets the programDescription to print with usage()
      CommandLineParser CommandLineParser.programName(String programName)
      Sets the programName to print with usage()
      static CommandLineParser CommandLineParser.withArguments(Argument<?>... argumentDefinitions)
      Creates a CommandLineParser with support for the given argumentDefinitions.
      static CommandLineParser CommandLineParser.withArguments(Iterable<Argument<?>> argumentDefinitions)
      Iterable version of withArguments(Argument...)
      static <E extends Enum<E> & Runnable & Describable>
      CommandLineParser      		 CommandLineParser.withCommands(Class<E> commandEnum)
      An alternative to Command that accepts an Enum following the Command Pattern.
      static CommandLineParser CommandLineParser.withCommands(Command... commands)
      Creates a CommandLineParser with support for commands.
